publications: [{"title":"Swift Enumerations","subtitle":"Presented a talk at Swift India meetup"}]
projects: [{"title":"Crypto - FIat Currency Converter, Portfolio Management & Coin Ticker","start_date":"Aug 2017","end_date":"Present","description":"Creating an iOS app as a self initiative as a hobby, to understand investing, crypto currency space & to sharpen my iOS & Swift skills. Also aim is to create a world class app as an Indian indie iOS developer."},{"title":"Kohls Self Checkout iPad App","start_date":"Aug 2017","end_date":"Present","description":"Working on an iPad application which enables Kohls users to scan, pay, and checkout by themselves inside Kohl's stores."},{"title":"25 Minute Workout Tracker : 90 day fitness program","start_date":"Apr 2015","end_date":"Present","description":"Ported earlier app to new for a new set of workouts due to users requests. Launch Date: Aug, 2016Overall Downloads: 31,700Sales: INR 1,21,000/-Overall Ratings: 4.6 Stars (Overall 51 Ratings)Tech Stack: Platform: iOS - iPhone & iPadLanguage: Entirely in Swift.Database: Realm"},{"title":"Insane 60 Day Workout Tracker","start_date":"Jan 2015","end_date":"Present","description":"Created entire app, as Indie Developer for a shot at the App Store. Handled the designs (including Sketch, Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop), UX, development & marketing (Screenshots, descriptions, some weblinks). Launch Date: May, 2016Overall Downloads: 58,700Sales: INR 3,07,000/-Overall Ratings: 3.8 Stars (Overall 17 Ratings)Tech Stack: Platform: iOS - iPhone & iPadLanguage: Entirely in Swift.Database: Realm"},{"title":"Query ","start_date":"Jul 2014","description":"Created an iOS version of popular online game \"Peter Answers\".Downloads: 4500Device: iPhone"},{"title":"Kohls Apple Watch","start_date":"Jul 2017","end_date":"Aug 2017","description":"Worked on adding Kohls Wallet & Kohls Gift Cards status on Apple Watch 2 & 3. #Entirely Swift 3"},{"title":"KPI App Kohls","start_date":"Jun 2017","end_date":"Aug 2017","description":"KPI app is used by Leadership of Kohls to understand metrics of sales using Adobe Omniture & Tableu. Worked on implementing Tableu (JavaScript), security & chat functionality.Team: 2 iOS developers"},{"title":"Kohls Ecommerce iOS App","start_date":"Oct 2015","end_date":"Apr 2016","description":"Worked on may features on the app used by millions of customers & which once reached rank 1 in Shopping Category on App Store.- Worked on Memory Management. Many screens in app had more than 100 leaks which quickly lead iOS app to 1GB+ memory footprint. Single handedly, removed all leaks in asked screens & reduced the memory footprints to a few MB's.- Also worked on improving Network, Battery & Performance issues using instruments.- Created the entire flow for Gift With Purchase for app.- Created then entire flow for Your Price which was a critical feature.- Worked on maintenance, bug fixes & other improvements.- Won Spot Award for contributions made in short time"},{"title":"Vestcom App","start_date":"Aug 2015","end_date":"Oct 2015","description":"Created an Cordova based app for Client Vestcom. Implemented Barcode, QRCode scanners. Created plugins which are now used by thousands of Vestcom customers for Shelf scans. The plugin as a stand alone component, can be used by any client, and be installed in their own iOS App.Team: 1 iOS & 1 Android developerResponsibility: Development, client interaction, maintanence & documentation"},{"title":"Kohl's Kiosk App","start_date":"Jun 2015","end_date":"Aug 2015","description":"Worked on migrating Kohl's iPhone app to iPad with a team of 3 members. Entire app was successfully migrated to iPad within 1.5 months."},{"title":"Pop Two Locks- Test Reflex By Simple Single Tap","start_date":"Aug 2014","end_date":"Sep 2014","description":"Created a fun, endless single tap game using Sprite Kit with Game Center integration.Downloads: 4000Platform: iOS Devices: iPad & iPhone"}]
